channel.title: How to check if server has enabled global pvp
channel.description:
I need to find a way to have the client check the server to see if global pvp/trading/dueling has been enabled to know which right click menu to show. Client currently looks at player location to determine if in wilderness. Having the server push global pvp status to all clients would be best for determining what to show for the right click on players menu.
Currently working with the packets that are sent from the server to the client.
